description: Accesschk is an access and privilege audit tool developed by SysInternal and often being used by attacker to verify privileges
name: Accesschk Usage To Check Privileges
query: ((Product:*AccessChk OR winlog.event_data.Description:*Reports\ effective\ permissions* OR process.executable.text:(*\\accesschk.exe OR *\\accesschk64.exe) OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"accesschk.exe") AND process.command_line.text:(*uwcqv\ * OR *kwsu\ * OR *qwsu\ * OR *uwdqs\ *))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea)
Mangatas Tondang (rule)
oscd.community
Nasreddine Bencherchali (modified)
